2"1L1e1t1 1m1e1 1j1u1s1t1 1t1e1l2 1y1o1u1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1B1e1a1u1 1B1i1d1e1n1,1"1 1H1a1r2i1s1 1c1o1n1t1i1n1u1e1d1 1W1e1d1n1e1s1d1a1y1.1 1"1I1 1l1e1a1r1n1e1d1 1q1u1i1c1k1l1y1 1t1h1a1t1 1B1e1a1u1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1k1i1n1d1 1o1f1 1g1u1y1 1w1h1o1 1i1n1s1p1i1r1e1d1 1p1e1o1p1l1e1 1t1o1 1b1e1 1a1 1b1e1t2e1r1 1v1e1r1s1i1o1n1 1o1f1 1t1h1e1m1s1e1l1v1e1s1.1 1H1e1 1r1e1a1l2y1 1w1a1s1 1t1h1e1 1b1e1s1t1 1o1f1 1u1s1.1 1A1n1d1 1w1h1e1n1 1I1 1w1o1u1l1d1 1a1s1k1 1h1i1m1,1 1'1W1h1e1r1e1'1d1 1y1o1u1 1g1e1t1 1t1h1a1t1?1 1W1h1e1r1e1'1d1 1t1h1i1s1 1c1o1m1e1 1f1r1o1m1?1'1 1H1e1'1d1 1a1l1w1a1y1s1 1t1a1l1k1 1a1b1o1u1t1 1h1i1s1 1d1a1d1.1"1
